verses.verse: וַיִּוָּעַ֣ץ <WH3289> consulted דָּוִ֗יד <WH1732> And David עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׂרֵ֧י <WH8269> with the captains הָאֲלָפִ֛ים <WH505> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֖וֹת <WH3967> and hundreds לְכָל־ <WH3605> every נָגִֽיד׃ <WH5057> [and] with every leader

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> And David לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> to all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> unto all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אִם־ <WH518> If עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <WH5921> seems ט֜וֹב <WH2895> If [it seem] good וּמִן־ <WH4480> is from יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto you and [that it be] of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God נִפְרְצָה֙ <WH6555> abroad נִשְׁלְחָ֞ה <WH7971> let us send עַל־ <WH5921> unto אַחֵ֣ינוּ <WH251> unto our brethren הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֗ים <WH7604> every where [that are] left בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אַרְצ֣וֹת <WH776> in all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעִמָּהֶ֛ם <WH5973> also הַכֹּהֲנִ֥ים <WH3548> and with them [also] to the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and Levites בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> [which are] in their cities מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <WH4054> [and] suburbs וְיִקָּבְצ֖וּ <WH6908> that they may gather אֵלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH413> and

וְנָסֵ֛בָּה <WH5437> And let us bring again אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> of our God אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <WH413> about כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not דְרַשְׁנֻ֖הוּ <WH1875> to us for we enquired בִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> not at it in the days שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said כָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> And all the congregation לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> that they would do so כֵּ֑ן <WH3651> so כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָשַׁ֥ר <WH3474> was right הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> for the thing בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the eyes כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of all the people

וַיַּקְהֵ֤ל <WH6950> together דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> So David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> all Israel מִן־ <WH4480> from שִׁיח֥וֹר <WH7883> from Shihor מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְעַד־ <WH5704> even לְב֣וֹא <WH935> even unto the entering חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hemath לְהָבִיא֙ <WH935> to bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God מִקִּרְיַ֖ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> from Kirjathjearim

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> went up דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> And David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> and all Israel בַּעֲלָ֔תָה <WH1173> to Baalah אֶל־ <WH413> about קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִ֖ים <WH7157> [that is] to Kirjathjearim אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לִיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> which [belonged] to Judah לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to bring up מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> thence the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <WH430> of God יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelleth הַכְּרוּבִ֖ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> is called שֵֽׁם׃ <WH8034> whose name

וַיַּרְכִּ֜יבוּ <WH7392> And they carried אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God עַל־ <WH5921> and עֲגָלָ֣ה <WH5699> cart חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <WH2319> in a new מִבֵּ֖ית <WH1004> out of the house אֲבִינָדָ֑ב <WH41> of Abinadab וְעֻזָּ֣א <WH5798> and Uzza וְאַחְי֔וֹ <WH283> and Ahio נֹהֲגִ֖ים <WH5090> drave בָּעֲגָלָֽה׃ <WH5699> the cart

וְדָוִ֣יד <WH1732> And David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> and all Israel מְשַׂחֲקִ֛ים <WH7832> played לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֹ֑ז <WH5797> with all [their] might וּבְשִׁירִ֤ים <WH7892> and with singing וּבְכִנֹּרוֹת֙ <WH3658> and with harps וּבִנְבָלִ֣ים <WH5035> and with psalteries וּבְתֻפִּ֔ים <WH8596> and with timbrels וּבִמְצִלְתַּ֖יִם <WH4700> and with cymbals וּבַחֲצֹצְרֽוֹת׃ <WH2689> and with trumpets

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> And when they came עַד־ <WH5704> against גֹּ֣רֶן <WH1637> unto the threshingfloor כִּידֹ֑ן <WH3592> of Chidon וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> put forth עֻזָּ֜א <WH5798> Uzza אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֗וֹ <WH3027> his hand לֶאֱחֹז֙ <WH270> to hold אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אָר֔וֹן <WH727> the ark כִּ֥י <WH3588> because שָֽׁמְט֖וּ <WH8058> stumbled הַבָּקָֽר׃ <WH1241> for the oxen

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֤ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעֻזָּ֔א <WH5798> against Uzza וַיַּכֵּ֕הוּ <WH5221> and he smote עַ֛ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> him because he put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> unto הָאָר֑וֹן <WH727> to the ark וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> and there he died שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וַיִּ֣חַר <WH2734> was displeased לְדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because פָרַ֧ץ <WH6555> had made יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> because the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <WH6556> a breach בְּעֻזָּ֑א <WH5798> upon Uzza וַיִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> is called לַמָּק֤וֹם <WH4725> wherefore that place הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he פֶּ֣רֶץ עֻזָּ֔א <WH6560> Perezuzza עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> to this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וַיִּירָ֤א <WH3372> was afraid דָוִיד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֵ֚יךְ <WH1963> How אָבִ֣יא <WH935> shall I bring אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אֵ֖ת <WH854> for אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הֵסִ֨יר <WH5493> brought דָּוִ֧יד <WH1732> So David אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָר֛וֹן <WH727> not the ark אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> him עִ֣יר <WH5892> [home] to himself to the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיַּטֵּ֕הוּ <WH5186> but carried it aside אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> of Obededom הַגִּתִּֽי׃ <WH1663> the Gittite

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <WH3427> remained אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> And the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> of God עִם־ <WH5973> with בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> with the family עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <WH5654> of Obededom בְּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> in his house שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <WH2320> months וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱדֹ֖ם <WH5654> of Obededom וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לֽוֹ׃ פ
